summary.description:
A Curated Database with Taxonomic Profiling of the Healthy Mouse Gastrointestinal Microbiome.

Murine microbiome database (MMDB) contains 16S rRNA gene-based microbiome taxonomic profiles of the healthy mouse gut microbiota with manually curated metadata.

Identify frequently found bacterial species in the gastrointestinal tract of healthy laboratory mice.

||| NAME EQUAL TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/mmdb.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Introducing Murine Microbiome Database'
summary.name: MMDB_autogenerated
